00018 #ifndef ERRORMATRIXTHREAD_H
00019 #define ERRORMATRIXTHREAD_H

00022 #include "errormatrixview.h"

00027 //include files for QT
00028 #include <qthread.h>
00029 
00037 class ErrorMatrixThread : public QThread  {
00038 public:
00039 
00040   //Only the method computeMatrix of ErrorMatrixView has access to the private part of ErrorMatrixThread,
00041   //the constructor of ErrorMatrixThread being private, only this method con create a new ErrorMatrixThread
00042   friend ErrorMatrixThread* ErrorMatrixView::computeMatrix();
00043 
00044      inline ~ErrorMatrixThread(){};
00045   inline Array<double>* getProbabilities(){return probabilities;};
00046   inline QValueList<int> getClusterList(){return clusterList;};
00047   inline QValueList<int> getComputedClusterList(){return computedClusterList;};
00048   inline QValueList<int> getIgnoreClusterIndex(){return ignoreClusterIndex;};
00049   
00051   inline void stopProcessing(){
00052    haveToStopProcessing = true;
00053    assistant.stopComputing();
00054   };
00055 
00056   class ErrorMatrixEvent;
00057   friend class ErrorMatrixEvent;
00058 
00059   inline ErrorMatrixEvent* getErrorMatrixEvent(){
00060     return new ErrorMatrixEvent(*this);
00061   };
00062 
00068   class ErrorMatrixEvent : public QCustomEvent{
00069    //Only the method getErrorMatrixEvent of ErrorMatrixThread has access to the private part of ErrorMatrixEvent,
00070    //the constructor of ErrorMatrixEvent being private, only this method con create a new ErrorMatrixEvent
00071    friend ErrorMatrixEvent* ErrorMatrixThread::getErrorMatrixEvent();
00072 
00073   public:
00074     inline ErrorMatrixThread* parentThread(){return &errorMatrixThread;};
00075     inline ~ErrorMatrixEvent(){};
00076 
00077   private:
00078     ErrorMatrixEvent(ErrorMatrixThread& thread):QCustomEvent(QEvent::User + 600),errorMatrixThread(thread){};
00079 
00080     ErrorMatrixThread& errorMatrixThread;
00081   };
00082 
00083 protected:
00084   void run();
00085            
00086 private:
00087 
00088  inline ErrorMatrixThread(ErrorMatrixView& view,Data& d):errorMatrixView(view),data(d),haveToStopProcessing(false){
00089    start();   
00090  };
00091 
00092  ErrorMatrixView& errorMatrixView;
00093  Data& data;
00094  Array<double>* probabilities;
00095  QValueList<int> clusterList;
00096  QValueList<int> computedClusterList;
00097  QValueList<int> ignoreClusterIndex;
00099  bool haveToStopProcessing;
00100  GroupingAssistant assistant;
00101 
00102 };
